p: Hemagglutination assay results were next confirmed with an infectious assay. Specifically, we determined the EC 2Log by TCID 50. Concordant with hemagglutination data, we observed that CPC conferred a 2 log reduction in influenza virus by TCID 50 (EC 2log) at ≤20 μg/mL (EC 2log) for all influenza strains tested. Again, influenza B appeared more susceptible to CPC than influenza A (4 μg/mL vs 20 μg/mL respectively).
